alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Augusta; Nelson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 11:48PM EDT until June 27 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia and western Virginia, including the following counties: in central Virginia, Albemarle and Nelson. In western Virginia, Augusta. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1148 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sherando... Shipman... Schuyler... Wintergreen... Montebello... Nellysford... Arrington... Lovingston... Bryant... Jonesboro... Greenfield... Tyro... Roseland... Massies Mill... Elma... Rockfish... Faber... Piney River... Tye River... Covesville... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
